content.2: And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father’s house,
content.3: And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
content.4: And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers,
content.5: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar
content.7: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of
content.8: And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these
content.9: And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour,
content.10: The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
content.11: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour,
content.12: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir,
content.13: The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
content.14: The sons of Manasseh; Ashriel, whom she bare: (
content.16: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother
content.17: And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These
content.18: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
content.19: And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
content.20: And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
content.21: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath
content.22: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
content.23: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.
content.26: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
content.27: Non his son, Jehoshua his son.
content.29: And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth-shean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.
content.30: The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
content.31: And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who
content.32: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
content.33: And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These
content.34: And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
content.35: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
content.36: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
content.37: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
content.38: And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
content.39: And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
